text:
The check for authenticated clients in oauth 2 server authorization code grant is weak and can be circumvented with a post request containing the field "client". At least require the request.client object to have an attribute (say request.client.client_id) and document this requirement appropriately. 

https://github.com/idan/oauthlib/blob/master/oauthlib/oauth2/draft25/grant_types.py#L521
title: Improve authenticated client check in
